:::{.def}

Git comes with internal documentation. This section covers how to access it.

:::

## Man pages

```{.bash}
git <command> --help
git help <command>
man git-<command>
```

:::{.example}

Example:

:::

```{.bash}
git commit --help
git help commit
man git-commit
```

:::{.info}

##### **Useful keybindings when you are in the pager**

```{.bash}
SPACE      scroll one screen down
b          scroll one screen up
q          quit
```

:::

## Command options

```{.bash}
git <command> -h
```

:::{.example}

Example:

:::

```{.bash}
git commit -h
```
